response.overview: Risky Desire is an audacious and provocative LGBTQ anthology directed by David Gonzalez. This sexy collection of gay films probes the boundaries of same-sex desire, exploring sensual, complex and often taboo relationships within the gay community. In a world where appearances are everything, a self-proclaimed straight man grapples with a secret fetish for gay intercourse. A devoted father finds his world turned upside down when he develops unexpected feelings for his teenage son. In the chaotic and often toxic world of gay dating, a young gay man battles to stay afloat. Jaded by past relationships and disillusioned by the superficiality of hookup culture, a lonely gay boy yearns for a genuine connection. Each film tackles different aspects of desire - be it hidden, forbidden or elusive - and presents characters who must confront their deepest fears and desires. The anthology boldly addresses questions of morality, identity and the lengths one will go to for love and acceptance.
response.title: Risky Desire
